abilities.name: Holy Cannons
about: Vertical beam that damages enemies it touches

abilities.name: Holy Bombs
about: Spawns multiple Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay

abilities.name: Molten Strike
about: Attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies encounter hits

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way
